Posts.Content: This may sound silly but .....I had my 2nd dose of FEC on wed 19th.  As I was sick with my first dose I was given Emend for chemo no 2 . I have just notices that I have 3 days more Ondansetron and Domperidone too. Is it usual to get more of these anti sickness med too?  I am sure I only had them for 3 days with first FEC
Posts.Title: ANTI SICKNESS MEDS
